alert.note: Alert for Iberville; Pointe Coupee; West Baton Rouge; West Feliciana (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 08 at 8:40PM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHEASTERN WEST FELICIANA, CENTRAL WEST BATON ROUGE, POINTE COUPEE AND NORTHWESTERN IBERVILLE PARISHES THROUGH 930 PM CST... At 840 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Bayou Current to near Mire. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... New Roads, St. Francisville, Livonia, Maringouin, Fordoche, Rosedale, Grosse Tete, Morganza, Ramah, Erwinville, and Lottie. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 127 and 147. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CST for southeastern Louisiana.

area.areaDesc: Iberville; Pointe Coupee; West Baton Rouge; West Feliciana
